item.description:
This Month's Movie: The King's Speech

I have already seen this movie, and I will tell you all now that it's great!

Here's the trailer on YouTube for those of you who don't know anything about the movie:
http://www.youtube.co...

We'll meet at the tables to the right of the entrance at 2:45pm. This allows us to get together, do introductions, purchase tickets and snacks, then go in to find seats together. The movie starts at 3:20, but PLEASE PLAN TO ARRIVE AT 2:45pm.

For those of you who don't know me, please don't hesitate to approach the group at the tables to the right of the entrance We try to watch out for new comers and we're always welcoming! See you then!
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be sitting at the tables to the right of the entrance. Please arrive by 2:45pm to get together, do introductions, purchase tickets and snacks, and go in to find seats together.
item.name: Movie Night! The King's Speech
